import{toast,ToastContainer,Zoom}from"react-toastify";import"react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css";// props 써서.
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Toastify(){if(localStorage.getItem("toastShow")==="1"){toast(String(localStorage.getItem("toastText")),{autoClose:700,position:"top-center",pauseOnFocusLoss:true,hideProgressBar:true,draggable:true,pauseOnHover:true,theme:"dark",closeButton:false,transition:Zoom});localStorage.removeItem("toastShow");localStorage.removeItem("toastText");}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ToastContainer,{});}export default Toastify;
